revised_title: Characterization of Peridinin-Chlorophyll a-Proteins in Symbiotic Dinoflagellates
tldr: The study investigates the isoelectric forms, quaternary structure, and amino acid composition of peridinin-chlorophyll a-proteins from the symbiotic dinoflagellate Symbiodinium microadriaticum. The researchers found that the patterns of isoelectric forms remain unchanged under different light conditions. They also discovered that the differences in isoelectric forms are due to the proteins' quaternary structure and not their amino acid composition.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Photosynthesis and Plant Physiology
